ValidationRule.description: Ensures that the other phone field is properly validated.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( OR(ISCHANGED(OtherPhone) && NOT(ISNULL(OtherPhone)) && NOT(ISBLANK(OtherPhone)) && !REGEX(OtherPhone ,'^\\d{10,25}$'), ISNEW() && NOT(ISNULL(OtherPhone)) && NOT(ISBLANK(OtherPhone)) && !REGEX(OtherPhone,'^\\d{10,25}$')),true,false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Invalid format entered for other phone. The minimum number of digits should be 10
